item.description:
THE STOMP! ITâ€™S HERE! Our annual Harvest Grapestomping Festival returns, bigger and better than ever! Wine tasting, Live Music, Dancing, Food, Tours, Vendors, Hayrides, Games and of course Grape Stomping, how can you resist?





Every year we have such a great time with all the others groups, we can't wait for it to come around! So come join us and share a laid back Sunday afternoon. Let's take in the beautiful vistas and Fall foliage, eat, dance or just relax and enjoy the company of so many of our Meetup members!

PLEASE BRING A DISH TO SHARE OR CHEESE AND CRACKERS, DIPS, FRUIT OR ANYTHING YOU CAN THINK OF THAT WOULD COMPLIMENT THE EVENT. ALSO PLEASE BRING A LAWN CHAIR AND JACKET JUST IN CASE. There will be food there to purchase but some nosh food is always welcomed! Last year we had quite a spread from all our members so please bring what you can to share.

This is a multi-group event so keep in mind there will be over 9 other various Meetup groups attending

CLICK HERE FOR LAST YEARS PHOTOS



Admission is adults $15.00, $10 for non drinking adults and Children under 21, FREE!

$5 OFF THE REGULAR $15 ADDMISSION PRICE FOR MEETUP MEMBERS just click here and print coupons!





Also keep in mind that it's right over the Newburgh/Beacon Bridge so you may want to carpool with a friend and split the gas. I will post this on the message board so that members can communicate with each other for carpooling purposes. Please post from which location you'll be leaving from and how many you can accommodate.





CLICK HERE for the Benmarl Winery website for more information



There will be a $1 Meetup fee to cover the website cost

Please get there early to help hold down some tables. Thank You and I'll see you there!

Margaret
item.how_to_find_us: "Look for the MeetupTable Signs and the organizers!"

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Multi-Group Meetup ANNUAL HARVEST GRAPESTOMPING FESTIVAL
